document_data.name: Quarrel
document_data.deathnotes: (Tramped to death by [[Cerulean]] in the [[Laughing Goblin Inn]])
document_data.mainbody: '''Quarrel''' was a [[half-orc]] [[assassin]] in the service of [[Tyranthraxus]].
document_data.Description: Quarrel was a slender and powerful female [[humanoid]] with black hair, [[jet]] colored eyes, and a [[wikipedia:pig|piggish]] nose.
document_data.Personality: Slim and beautiful, spoke with a rough voice and could not escape her [[orc]] heritage.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Quarrel armed herself with her favorite [[dagger]] and wore dark [[wikipedia:cape|cape]] over her [[chain mail]].

History.Death: A day later on the 28th of [[Flamerule]] 1340 DR, Quarrel met the heroes in the [[Laughing Goblin Inn]] but they refused to join Tyranthraxus, so she threw her poisoned dagger at Shal and fled. During a short melee in the inn, Quarrel had her skull crushed in under the hooves of Shal's [[horse]] [[familiar]], [[Cerulean]].
